alert.note: Alert for Jewell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 8:19PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jewell and southeastern Nuckolls Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 818 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Superior, or 25 miles northwest of Belleville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hardy around 835 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
